question: Some people think that news and media are affecting our life in a positive way while others disagree what is your opinion? Give reason for your answer and include example form your own experience.
text: News has been a reliable source of information and knowledge. Many people believe that newspapers and television channels are impacting us in a positive way,whereas, other people reckon that is disagreement. I strongly agree with this phenomenon and in the ensuing paragraphs I will allude to these arguments further.

Today, the world is changing rapidly, it is crucial to keep ourselves updated with the latest developments. News provides us a deep knowledge and understanding of the latest happenings around the world. For example, a few days ago, thousands of kilometres forest burns in Australia and around one million natural habitats, killed, this news informed and knowing about the phenomena by the news channels. Furthermore, the news helps numerous way. If you are learning a foreign language, it would help in different areas. Such as reading skill, and learning new vocabulary. As a result, it makes very easy for people to react to current events.

Media is the vital source of entertaining, which rejuvenates and entertains us throughout the day. People have a lot of stress in their daily life. Listening  to favourite music and watching videos give us a relief from the job work and relaxation from family conflicts. For instance, I am a student who spends around two hours every night to watch a comedy show on television because it is evident that the media plays an important role in our daily life.
To conclude, I strongly opine that the news and media influence people live in a positive way as they entertain and give latest news us.
